name: Duality (itch) (Sean Balfour)
description:
Get the dots/players to the goals/crosses!

WASD/Arrow Keys to move the dots, the right side will move in reverse to the left.

Escape/P to pause the game.

R to restart the current level.

Snowflakes will freeze the opposite side for a number of turns.

Triangles are switches to swap which side the blocked nodes are on.

Squares are blocked nodes.
